top_procedures.description: Insertion or replacement of single or dual chamber pacing defibrillator leads

Insertion of new or replacement of permanent pacemaker including upper and lower chamber electrodes

Insertion of needle and/or catheter into dialysis circuit and balloon dilation of dialysis segment, with imaging including radiological supervision and interpretation
